## StandardRendererOptions type

Standard configuration options available for all renderers.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type StandardRendererOptions = {
    hidden?: boolean;
    validateFn?: (data: any, path: string, label: string) => ErrorObject[];
    i18n?: {
        [key: string]: any;
    };
};
```
